name: Already Dead (gpt /ai Game)
description:
"Already Dead" is a puzzle platform game prototype that challenges players to communicate with dead characters to uncover the reasons behind their deaths. Powered by GPT-3, the game features engaging dialogue-based puzzle-solving mechanics that offer a unique and intriguing gameplay experience.

Controls: arrow keys to move, ctrl to jump and shift to switch using keyboard and mouseText is entered using the keyboard. And confirmed with the mouse on the S button or Enter.

This game is only a experimatal Prototype.

For playing this game you will need an OpenAi api key

Currently only two levels are available
